verbs.description: [ARG0: sixers] [V: finish] [ARG1: the preseason] [ARGM-MNR: at 3 - 1] and can now prepare for boston the sixers concluded the 2018 preseason schedule in shenzhen for the nba china games against the dallas mavericks in a losing effort 115 - 112 boston twitter universiade sports centre dario saric kyrie irving sixers nba dario šarić dallas ben simmons philadelphia for boston brett brown mike muscala shenzhen national basketball association axgilbert td bank garden joel embiid boston celtics markelle fultz dallas mavericks gordon hayward anthony gilbert
